name: The Great Escape
description: The Great Escape is a infinity runner where player guides a spaceship through a narrow tunnel filled with incoming obstacles. The more you advance harder the hazards become.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP, Vista or 7 Processor: 1GHz or faster processor Memory: 1 GB RAM DirectX: Version 9.0c Storage: 500 MB available space

reviews.review_text: Im not even sure if this is a finished product on not. the the game begins with you being auto-steered into a power ball and.... thats it, you die, you can either try again, or exit (which quits the entire game, sending you some subliminal message about why you shouldnt be playing it) I gave reading the poorly spelled instructions a try, but even with that at your side, it seems pressing the keys does nothing but make the game laugh at you while you fly towards that power ball. In conclusion, this game is not worth the price tag

I do not really attract me such games because after a while they fail to pass several hurdles or not I realize how wide is the plane , there is a chance to shake me a little more ...  You have to play long so I can play well and pass several hurdles .  The game idea is interesting. In my opinion keys should be explained somewhat by the ' drive ' plane.   I would say to try it ...
